snippet: The Rev. Alejandro Solalinde has raised Mexicans’ awareness of the plight of Central and South American migrants who face extortion, rape, kidnapping and murder en route to the United States.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Rev Alejandro Solalinde, who has made it his life's mission to raise Mexicans’ awareness of the plight of Central and South American migrants who face extortion, rape, kidnapping and murder en route to the United States.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Alejandro Solalinde has raised Mexicans’ awareness of the plight of Central and South American migrants who face extortion, rape, kidnapping and murder en route to the United States.
